articles.title: DPRK Delegation Has No Intention to Meet U.S. Side
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Has No Intention to Meet U.S. Side
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Jo Yong Sam, department director general of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, Wednesday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the fact that U.S. authorities say this or that over the issue of contact between the DPRK's delegation participating in the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics and the U.S. vice-president:
					 On Tuesday a spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State told a reporter over the possible contact between the DPRK's delegation participating in the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics and the U.S. vice-president that the U.S. evidently has no plan to contact with the DPRK during and after the Olympics.
					
					 U.S. Vice-President Pence, too, said that he didn't press for any contact with the DPRK's delegation and asked the south Korean authorities to fix a schedule not to encounter the delegation. And he claimed that they would see what is happening.
					
					 This is the height of sarcasm.
					
					 We have never begged for dialogue with the U.S. nor in the future, too.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, we have no intention to meet with the U.S. side during the stay in south Korea.
					
					 Our delegation's visit to south Korea is only to take part in the Olympics and hail its successful holding.
					
					 We are not going to use such sports festival as the Winter Olympics as a political lever. There is no need to do so.
					
					 The U.S. had better act with discretion, well aware that its imprudent word and deeds will only show itself in a more awkward position.

articles.title: Commanding Officers of KPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Commanding Officers of KPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Commanding officers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on February 8, the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 The visitors paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls of immortality where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made deep bows to them in the humblest reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their revolutionary life.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Great Leaders
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Great Leaders
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Seen before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang was a floral basket from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed at the statues were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises and schools at all levels in the city.
					
					 The visitors made bows to the statues.
					
					 Floral baskets in the name of units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises and other units, together with bouquets and flowers, were laid before the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and other places in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and school youth and children in across the country paid floral tribute to the statues of the great leaders and mosaics depicting their beaming images in their residential quarters.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid at the statues and cemeteries and tombs of martyrs and memorial towers for the fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) across the country on Thursday, on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 Attending the wreath-laying ceremonies were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, men and officers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people and school youth and children.
					
					 Placed there were wreaths in the names of the local party and power organs, working people's organizations, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, industrial establishments, farms and other units, together with bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute to the martyrs.

articles.title: People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
articles.content:
People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- People's delegations visited units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on the occasion of its founding anniversary.
					 The units were overflowing with affections of blood ties between the army and people as members of the people's delegations congratulated service personnel on the army day and the latter were excited with joy.
					
					 The visitors conveyed the efforts of the people behind the front to the service personnel and handed them supplies they prepared sincerely.
					
					 They, together with the service members, participated in colorful political and cultural events held to celebrate the anniversary.
					
					 Talking to the soldiers who have distinguished themselves in the combat and political training, they conveyed to them the warm request of the people hoping that the soldiers will defend the posts of the country as firm as a rock.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country on Thursday in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Dancing venues in Pyongyang included the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 The participants began dancing to the tune of "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					
					 They danced in humble reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who creditably accomplished the cause of building the revolutionary regular armed forces and developed the KPA into the matchless and invincible revolutionary army.
					
					 "At Square of Military Parade", "Song of Airman" and other songs revved up the atmosphere of the dancing parties.
					
					 When the song "Cheers of the People" resounded over the dancing venues, the dancers were full of high pride of holding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were also staged in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Historic Day in Building Juche-type Revolutionary Armed Forces
articles.content:
Historic Day in Building Juche-type Revolutionary Armed Forces
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- February 8 is a historic day when the birth of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was declared.
					 After the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung set it as a prerequisite for building an independent and sovereign state to found a regular armed forces, and put forward the line of building a revolutionary regular army embracing sons and daughters of the working people with the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters as its backbone.
					
					 Under his guidance, the Pyongyang Institute was established in February Juche 35 (1946) to produce military and political officers and the Central Security Officers Training School in July that year to train commanding officers and technical personnel of all branches of arms and services.
					
					 An aviation class was formed at the Pyongyang Institute in March 1946 and the Marine Security Officers Training School founded to train military cadres for air and naval forces in a far-sighted way. 
					
					 And the Security Officers Training Center was organized to train core members of the regular army and, on this basis, it had been pushed forward to expand different units of arms and services.
					
					 Early in October 1945, the President visited Phyongchon-ri in Pyongyang and unrolled the grand plan for founding the Juche-oriented national defence industry. Thanks to his leadership, the munitions factory, the first of its kind in the country, came into being in June 1947 to produce weapons and military hardware by its own efforts.
					
					 Under these circumstances, a military parade was held on February 8, 1948 to proclaim the birth of the KPA, the people's army carrying forward the tradition of the anti-Japanese revolutionary armed struggle and having different services and arms fully supported by the independent munitions industry.
					
					 Since its founding, the KPA has reliably defended the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution with arms, frustrating the U.S. imperialists' ceaseless moves to provoke a war, and fully discharged its mission and duty as the creator of the people's happiness.
					
					 It defeated the U.S. imperialists, which boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, in the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953) and captured the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo to exact a written apology from the U.S.
					
					 Now, the KPA is further demonstrating its might as a powerful revolutionary elite army fully ready to react to any form of war under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is ushering in the greatest heyday of building the revolutionary armed forces.

articles.title: Congratulations to Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Bangladeshi President
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to MD. Abdul Hamid on his reelection as president of the People's Republic of Bangladesh.
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his responsible work, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Papers Praise Army-Building Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men
articles.content:
Papers Praise Army-Building Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Thursday dedicate editorials to the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They stress that the foundation of the KPA by President Kim Il Sung on February 8, Juche 37 (1948) was a historic event of great significance in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the founder-builder of the heroic KPA.
					
					 After the liberation of the country the building of regular armed forces became an urgent task which brooks no moment's delay due to the U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea and massive war preparations. With deep insight into the prevailing situation and lawful requirement of the developing revolution, the President set forward the building of the regular revolutionary armed forces as the top priority of the state affairs and directed utmost efforts to it. He successfully accomplished the cause of the building of the regular revolutionary armed forces in less than three years under the difficult conditions where there was neither experience nor foundation. It is the immortal revolutionary exploit that could be performed only by the President, an outstanding statesman, military genius and peerless patriot.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il wisely led the Korean revolutionary armed forces to demonstrate the invincible might with outstanding military idea and rare commanding art. The revolutionary character of the KPA which has firmly maintained its nature as the Party's revolutionary armed forces down through generations is associated with the clairvoyance of the great leaders. And its mettle as an invincible army that has set an example in the world history of anti-imperialist struggle, assuming the perfect features of regular army and forming a harmonious whole with the civilians is also associated with the seasoned guidance of the leaders.
					
					 Today the KPA ushers in a heyday of its development under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The KPA under his guidance will bravely open a broad avenue for the Juche revolution, demonstrating its tremendous might.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the KPA is an invincible revolutionary army which paved an original path for building regular revolutionary armed forces in the era of independence and has firmly carried forward the ever-victorious history and tradition under the guidance of the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Blasted for Lunacy
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Blasted for Lunacy
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Recently Japanese Prime Minister Abe made a policy speech at the House of Representatives.
					 In his speech he said that he would make all efforts for global peace and prosperity under the banner of "proactive pacifism".
					
					 Crying out for "protecting the people", he said that he would exert his effort to increase defense capabilities needed in practice rather than the existing extension line.
					
					 Next day Defense Minister Onodera, agreeing to Abe's remarks, said that he would think of defence capabilities needed in practice, calling for "protecting the people" under the pretext of "severe reality".
					
					 Their remarks were timed to coincide with military moves, evidenced by brisk military exercises of various missions staged in Japan in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Thursday says that this is a typical revelation of the Japanese reactionaries' overseas expansion ambition to make Japan into a war state at any cost wearing a veil of "peace".
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Japan, a war criminal state, is not allowed to turn itself into a military giant nor take part in a war.
					
					 However, it, under the patronage of its master U.S., is preparing itself for making a preemptive attack and making desperate efforts to realize the ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 The Japanese reactionary ruling circles, running amuck obsessed with the overseas expansion ambition, would be well advised to cool their heads overheated with the ambition for reinvasion and think twice.
					
					 No country in the world will allow Japan's aggression.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Abandon War Scenario
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Abandon War Scenario
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic and social organizations in south Korea reportedly held a press conference in Seoul on February 5 to urge the U.S. administration to give up the "bloody nose operation" plan for preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					 They stressed that the U.S. should stop imposing sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, give up south Korea-U.S. joint military maneuvers and come to DPRK-U.S. dialogue without preconditions.

articles.title: Chinese Media Slashed for Arrogantly Meddling in Event of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Chinese Media Slashed for Arrogantly Meddling in Event of Korean Nation
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The following is the full text of "For what they despicably intrude on other's affair", an article written by Jong Phil which was carried on the DPRK's leading newspapers Thursday:
					 The ties between the north and the south of Korea are now on the track of positive development.
					
					 Thanks to the DPRK's proactive proposal and steps, a breakthrough was made toward detente, peace and improvement of the relations between the north and the south and the enthusiasm of the fellow countrymen to hold the Winter Olympics as a successful event of the nation is sweeping the whole Korean Peninsula.
					
					 At this time, some media of China, not to be left behind the U.S. and Japan, reactionaries of history, are letting out impudent arguments of individual experts, seriously spoiling the atmosphere for the feast.
					
					 The Chinese Central TV Network on Feb. 5 aired an assertion of a vice-researcher of the Institute for Asia-Pacific and World Strategy under the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences: The DPRK calculated to show an open aspect of the country and improve its international image through the south Korea visit by the president of the Presidium of its Supreme People's Assembly. The international community is expecting the DPRK to show greater sincerity and concession over the denuclearization issue if it truly hopes for promoting the detente on the Korean peninsula. Unless it does so, it will be difficult for the DPRK to attain its purpose.
					
					 On the same day, the Global Times of China's People's Daily carried an argument made by a senior research fellow at the China Institute of International Studies that restoring inter-Korean relations without touching on the nuclear issue is unsustainable and fragile. 
					
					 Earlier in January, some Chinese media made wicked assertions that the sustenance of the atmosphere for detente on the Korean peninsula is closely related to the solution of the "nuclear issue of the DPRK" and that "detente will not last long without common recognition of the denuclearization".
					
					 Such incoherent talks heard from Chinese media can not but be retorted as an arrogant act aimed at interference in the internal issue of the Korean nation and an unreasonable logic and sophism ignorant of the essence of the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Obvious is the stand of the DPRK to successfully hold the Winter Olympics as a national event and fully display the dignity and might of the Korean nation and, therefore, this is supported and welcomed by all the fellow countrymen and the international community.
					
					 It is only the U.S. and other outsiders who are to blame for the division of the Korean Peninsula and the tension there that stand against the Korean nation working hard to open up a new chapter for peace on the peninsula by its concerted efforts.
					
					 China's experts and media, that have touted for "peaceful solution" to the Korean peninsula issue whenever an opportunity presented itself, now shun the present positive development of the situation and are arguing for and against while setting the DPRK's participation in the Winter Olympics against its strategic issue. How can such behavior be interpreted as an act of allegedly "disinterested" neighbors.
					
					 This is evidently an act of screwballs feeling dissatisfaction with the north and the south of Korea aspiring after detente and peace, and a mischievous act to reverse and divert the international focus away from the atmosphere for the north-south reconciliation.
					
					 It reminds one of a mean fellow looking over the fence of a feast host.
					
					 The Winter Olympics has nothing to do with "denuclearization".
					
					 As acknowledged by the world, the DPRK's possession of nuclear deterrence was a legitimate option for self-defense reflective of the stern historical lesson and the reality in which the DPRK's sincere efforts for the denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula were ignored and the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK aimed to destroy its sovereignty and rights to existence and development has daily increased.
					
					 At this time, swimming against the atmosphere of peace on the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. is rendering to the extremes the political and military threat and brandishing a fireball after shipping huge aggression forces including all sorts of ultramodern nuclear war weapons to the sky, land and sea, thereby threatening the Winter Olympics and the post-Olympics situation.
					
					 If one truly hopes for peace on the Korean Peninsula and regional stability, it is reasonable for one to say what it should do to the trouble-maker U.S.
					
					 It is illogical for the Chinese media to absurdly vociferate about "denuclearization", far from saying what it should do.
					
					 So, is an event of "denuclearization" ever on the list of the Winter Olympics?
					
					 Call a spade a spade. It is very despicable of those Chinese media to mess with their neighbor's event, far from offering congratulations to it.
					
					 Ignoring the reality and occasion, they are forcibly linking the issue of "denuclearization" to the Olympics, which cannot be interpreted otherwise than an act aimed to spoil others' feast.
					
					 They betrayed the dark intention to distract the international caution focused on them to the DPRK by doggedly standing in the way of creating reconciliation atmosphere between the north and the south of Korea that would have a positive impact on the world peace and the development of the regional situation.
					
					 They are trying to hold the issue of inter-Korean relations on nuclear issue leash and use it as leverage for interference.
					
					 They, in the long run, left the international community unpleasant feelings that the "initiative and proactive neighboring diplomacy" only seeks interference in the internal affairs of other countries and nations.
					
					 Recently they slandered the DPRK's measure for self-defense as "narrow-minded interpretation of outside and self-justified action in the nuclear and missile issue". They also belittled the military capabilities of the DPRK, quoting a "conclusion drawn after inspecting from the south side position in Panmunjom". Now to what extent have they reached.
					
					 Some experts and media of China engrossed in admonishing others are now showing the same proclivity as the Trump and Abe groups and the conservative riff-raffs of south Korea marginalized after being isolated and rejected in the world.
					
					 Going blind in judging the trend of the times would make one face great disappointment.
					
					 Such senseless meddling doesn't fit the appearance of a "power".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Brazilian Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Brazilian Body
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics on Feb. 1 posted on its website President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Occasion of the Founding of the Korean People's Army" in the run-up to the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 The work, published on February 8, Juche 37 (1948), is an immortal program proclaiming the founding of the KPA and indicating tasks for strengthening the KPA into the invincible people's armed forces and the revolutionary army as befits a regular army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Mongolia
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of the great HE Kim Jong Il was formed on Jan. 26.
					 E. Maksim, executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 27 to Feb. 16 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of leader Kim Jong Il and introducing the struggle of the Korean army and people who are speeding up the building of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Slovakia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Slovakia
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Slovak preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Bratislava on Jan. 27.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association and chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting and Studying the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 27 to Feb. 20 and decided to hold various political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Nicos Anastasiades
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Nicos Anastasiades
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al reelecto presidente de la Republica de Chipre, Nicos Anastasiades.
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre los dos paises se desarrollaran positivamente conforme a los intereses comunes, el remitente deseo mayores exitos en las labores responsables del destinatario por la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Nuestra delegacion no piensa contactarse con la parte norteamericana, afirma Jo Yong Sam
articles.content:
Nuestra delegacion no piensa contactarse con la parte norteamericana, afirma Jo Yong Sam
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que las autoridades estadounidenses hablan a sus caprichos del problema de contacto entre la delegacion de la RPDC y el vicepresidente estadounidense que participaran en el acto inaugural de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, el director del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jo Yong Sam, dio el dia 7 la siguiente respuesta:
					El dia 6, cuando un periodista pregunto sobre la posibilidad de contacto entre nuestra delegacion y el vicepresidente estadounidense que participaran en el acto inaugural de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, el portavoz del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. contesto que "no hay el plan de encontrarse con el Norte de Corea durante y despues de esa cita deportiva" y "quiere dejarlo en claro".
					
					El vicepresidente estadounidense Pence tambien dijo que "no ha pedido ningun tipo de contacto con la delegacion norcoreana" y "exigio a las autoridades surcoreanas que eviten la concurrencia con ella". Ademas, agrego asi en tono jactancioso: "Vamos a ver que va a pasar".
					
					!Que ridiculo es eso!
					
					Nuestro pais nunca le ha suplicado el dialogo a EE.UU. y tampoco lo hara en el futuro.
					
					Evidentemente dicho, no pensamos contactarnos con la parte norteamericana durante la visita al Sur de Corea.
					
					Nuestra delegacion viaja al Sur de Corea con el mero objetivo de felicitar la apertura exitosa del evento deportivo participando en el mismo.
					
					No queremos utilizar ese festival deportivo como espacio politico ni tenemos la necesidad de hacerlo.
					
					Le convendria a EE.UU. portarse como caballero teniendo presente que su inapropiado acto verbal pone de relieve su situacion incomoda.

articles.title: Comandantes del EPC visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Comandantes del EPC visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 70 de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los comandantes del EPC visitaron el dia 8 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Los visitantes rindieron tributo a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos. 
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes otorgadas a los lideres antecesores y otras de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren, usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas revolucionarias para las visitas de orientacion en el terreno y viajes al extranjero.

articles.title: Periodicos enumeran proezas de grandes Lideres por la construccion del EPC
articles.content:
Periodicos enumeran proezas de grandes Lideres por la construccion del EPC
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales coreanos publicaron hoy los editoriales dedicados al 70o aniversario de fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					La fundacion del EPC por el Presidente Kim Il Sung el 8 de febrero del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche fue un acontecimiento historico de enorme importancia para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, destacaron los rotativos. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun adelanta que el Presidente es el fundador y constructor del heroico EPC y continua:
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria, los imperialistas norteamericanos ocuparon el suelo surcoreano y comenzaron a preparar la guerra. En tales circunstancias, la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares se presentaba como mayor prioridad. 
					
					Percatado de la situacion y la demanda legitima de la revolucion en desarrollo, Kim Il Sung presto atencion primordial a la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares revolucionarias presentandola como el mas importante de los asuntos estatales. 
					
					Y cumplio exitosamente esta causa en menos de tres anos en las condiciones dificiles en que no hubo las experiencias ni el cimiento. He aqui la imborrable proeza revolucionaria del extraordinario politico, genial estratega militar y patriota sin par. 
					
					Con su destacada ideologia militar y extraordinaria arte de mando, el Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il condujeron sabiamente para que el EPC ostentara su poderio de ejercito invencible. 
					
					Gracias a la larga prevision de los grandes Lideres y su probada direccion, el EPC mantiene de decada en decada su caracter de fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del partido y crea el ejemplo de relevancia mundial en la lucha antiimperialista estableciendo la unidad monolitica con las masas populares. 
					
					Hoy dia, el EPC acoge la era de esplendor bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Bajo la orientacion de su Comandante Supremo, el EPC abrira con valentia la senda de avance de la revolucion del Juche manifestando su poderio inagotable.  
					
					Minju Joson apunta que el EPC es el invencible ejercito revolucionario que bajo la direccion de los grandes hombres sin iguales, allano el camino inexplorado de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares y vino continuando generacion tras generacion la historia y la tradicion de victoria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica la doctrina de "pacifismo activo" de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica la doctrina de "pacifismo activo" de Japon
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- En su reciente "discurso sobre la politica gubernamental", hecho en la camara de representantes de la Dieta, el premier japones Abe chismeo que haria todo lo posible por la paz y la prosperidad del orbe levantando en alto la bandera del "pacifismo activo". En cuanto a la "proteccion del pueblo", apunto que se esforzaria no como lo hacia antes sino por mejorar la capacidad de defensa realmente necesaria.
					Al repetir como papagayo el dia siguiente las palabras de Abe, el ministro de Defensa, Onodera, se refirio a la "proteccion del pueblo" frente a la "realidad rigurosa" y agrego que pensaria en el poderio defensivo realmente necesitado.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, cobran intensidad en el suelo japones los ejercicios conjuntos con EE.UU. y otros movimientos militares.
					
					Revela asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de hoy y prosigue:
					
					El hecho constituye una expresion coherente de la ambicion expansionista a ultramar de los reaccionarios japoneses que quieren convertir el pais en el capaz de hacer la guerra bajo el vistoso cartel de la "paz".
					
					A Japon, pais criminal de guerra, estan prohibidas la conversion en potencia militar y la participacion en guerra.
					
					Sin embargo, bajo el amparo de su patron norteamericano, prepara la capacidad de ataque preventivo y anda desesperado para realizar su ambicion expansionista a ultramar.
					
					Los gobernantes reaccionarios japoneses deberan calmar su fiebre expansionista al darse cuenta de que ningun pais tolerara la agresion de Japon aunque eso sucedio en el siglo pasado.
